Package com.jme.effect.shapes

Class EmitterMeshConvexHullShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.effect.shapes.EmitterMeshVertexShape
      • com.jme.effect.shapes.EmitterMeshFaceShape
        • com.jme.effect.shapes.EmitterMeshConvexHullShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmitterShape, Savable, JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class EmitterMeshConvexHullShape
extends EmitterMeshFaceShape
    This emitter shape emits the particles from the given shape's interior constrained by its convex hull (a geometry that tightly wraps the mesh). So in case of multiple meshes some vertices may appear in a space between them.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)
